```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load("tidyverse","quanteda","readtext")
```


```{r data}
teamcode <- readtext(file = here::here("data", "replications_redacted", "*"))

# meta data variables
teamcode <- teamcode %>%
  mutate(team = str_extract(text, '\\d+'),
         software = str_extract(text, 'Software.*'),
         software = gsub("Software:", "", software),
         version = str_extract(text, 'Version.*'),
         version = gsub("Version:", "", version))

# codes used
#define and then count codes
```
